name: Mini Dice
description:
Mini Dice

It's Minigolf but with dice!

Your dice bounces from walls but only as many times as the value your dice shows! Use the environment to plan your shots carefully and reach the goal before your opponent does or knock their dice to throw them off their path.

Assign dice values to power-ups to get one up on your opponent once you roll the number.

Tutorial

The game is playable with mouse or 1-2 controllers. We strongly recommend downloading the native version for the best visual experience.

Each player rolls their dice one after another, aiming to reach the goal before any other player. Your dice can bounce off walls only as many times as its value shows.

At the start of each level, all players get to select a power-up that is assigned to a dice value. The power-up will be active whenever your dice shows its value.
